author: Prahlad Menon

description.zh_Hans: 为飞行员和学员提供安全操作指导与飞行实践支持的专业助手。
description.zh_Hant: 爲飛行員和學員提供安全操作指導與飛行實踐支持的專業助手。
description.en: A professional assistant providing safety operation guidance and flight practice support for pilots and trainees.
